title: First Race, First Win: Van der Poel Opens 2025 with Smash-Mouth Sprint at Le Samyn
content:
Van der Poel was back in beast mode in chaotic season opener in first road race since the Zurich worlds. Wiebes fastest in the women's race.

Read the full article at First Race, First Win: Van der Poel Opens 2025 with Smash-Mouth Sprint at Le Samyn on Velo.
author: ahood
